statements.name: PROC ACCELERATOR
statements.description: Starts or stops a continuous session, or publishes, runs, or deletes a model in a data source.

arguments.name: LIBRARY=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the SAS library where the model is run.

statements.name: STARTSESSION
statements.description: Starts the SAS Embedded Process continuous session.

arguments.name: PLATFORMENDPOINT=
arguments.description: specifies the URL that is used to submit execution requests over a REST interface to services such as Databricks execution context.

arguments.name: TRACE
arguments.description: specifies whether the SAS Embedded Process runs with traces.

statements.name: STOPSESSION
statements.description: Stops the SAS Embedded Process continuous session.

statements.name: PUBLISHMODEL
statements.description: Publishes a model to a data source.

arguments.name: MODELTABLENAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the table to which the model is published.

arguments.name: PROGRAMFILE=
arguments.description: specifies the file that contains the model program to be published.

arguments.name: FORMATSFILE=
arguments.description: specifies the file that contains the user-defined format XML definition to be published.

arguments.name: MODELTYPE=
arguments.description: specifies the type of the input model program.

arguments.name: DATASTEP
arguments.description: specifies that the input model program is DATA step code.

arguments.name: DS2
arguments.description: specifies that the input model program is DS2 code.

arguments.name: STOREFILES=
arguments.description: specifies a list of analytic store .sasast files, one for each analytic store to be published.

arguments.name: VARSFILE=
arguments.description: specifies the file that contains the variable metadata XML to be used during translation of an input DATA step model program to DS2.

statements.name: RUNMODEL
statements.description: Runs a model in a data source.

arguments.name: INPUTTABLENAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the input table.

arguments.name: MODELTABLENAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the table to which the model is published.

arguments.name: OUTPUTTABLENAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the output table.

arguments.name: KEEPLISTCOLUMNS=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the column (or columns) to be kept by the DS2 program.

statements.name: DELETEMODEL
statements.description: Deletes a model from a data source.

arguments.name: MODELTABLENAME=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the table to which the model is published.
